thread.section_title: busuu Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of busuu | www.busuu.com | 2 of 240
thread.title: customer

author: customer
title: customer
text: This app has been helpful to me in learning a new language. I do my learning from several different apps and live teachers. Busuu app provides a unique and valuable way of learning that has helped me progress on my path to mastering a new language. I've been learning a new language for personal enrichment and development and busuu app has been incomparable to other apps that I've tried before. I'd recommend it to anyone who want to learn a new language.
